sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' // import context from './usecontext' import { useLocation, useSearchParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Deliveryaddress = () => { const[idd,setidd]=useState() const[date,setdate]=useState() const[expectday,setexpectday]=useState() const location = useLocation(); const [params]=useSearchParams() const { name, mobile, address, totalPrice,cash,email } = location.state || {}; const id=params.get("id") const mycomponent = () => { const currentdate = new Date(); const year = currentdate.getFullYear(); const month = currentdate.getMonth() + 1; // add 1 to get correct month const day = currentdate.getDate(); // get day of the month const expectedday=day+4; // const formattedDate = `${day}/${month}/${year}`; const formattedDate=day+"/"+month+"/"+year // const newdate1=`${expectedday}/${month}/${year}`; const newdate1=expectedday+"/"+month+"/"+year setdate(formattedDate); setexpectday(newdate1) } return (

thank you

Payment is successfully processsed and your order is on the way

Transaction ID:{id}

summery

  • order ID:
    • {idd}
  • Order Date:{date}
  • Order Total: {totalPrice}
  • Name:{name}

Address

  • Address:{address}
  • Mobile No:{mobile}
  • Email:{email}
  • {cash}

payment method

Pay on Delivery (Cash/Card). Cash on delivery (COD) available. Card/Net banking acceptance subject to device availability.

expected date of delivery: {expectday}

track order
) } export default Deliveryaddress
